sentences.sContent: In the first half they realise their boss is exploiting them and begin to understand the theory of surplus value.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the first half they realise their boss is exploiting them and begin to understand the theory of surplus value.
sentences.sCn: 在前半部，工人们认识到他们的老板是在剥削他们，开始了解剩余价值理论。

trans.tranCn: 认识到， 了解； 实现
